title: Augmented Reality-Based Project Learning on States of Matter Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Augmented reality-based learning modules conducted primarily via smartphones in non-PC environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain particle-level microscopic changes during phase transitions (solid-liquid-gas) using augmented reality simulations
Learners can connect conditions (temperature, pressure, etc.) to phenomena of phase changes through project deliverables utilizing AR modules
Learners analyze and present real-life examples related to phase changes via LMS-uploaded assignments and provide scientific evidence

resources: Basic Chemistry Lab Equipment Image Resources
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
